Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

(Several hours after Red Bolt is repaired) Freewing is looking at the pure, 
clear starfilled night. He hears Red Bolt walk up from somewhere behind him. 
"These are troubled times." Red Bolt said. "We've seen factions everywhere, 
and just today, we witnessed a base being assaulted. War should not be a part 
of transformer life. We must end this war. We must build a new base." "I 
agree with you mostly, Red Bolt, but a new base requires personnel and 
troops. Not to mention building materials. Where could we find these assets?" 
Freewing uttered in a low tone.

--part1_92.f8ee767.27a4e17f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
